name: bishal-data-fetcher
description: A WordPress plugin to fetch and display data from an external API.
author: Bishal Shrestha

scripts.package: pnpm build && mkdir -p package && VERSION=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && NAME=$(node -p "require('./package.json').name") && zip -r package/${NAME}-v${VERSION}.zip . -x 'node_modules/*' -x 'src/edit.js' -x 'src/index.js' -x 'src/block.json' -x 'src/render.php' -x '*.zip' -x 'package/*'
